div.a: A Breakdown Of The $4.5 Billion Worth Of Crimes BP Committed

div.div: A breakdown of the money, where it is going, why and, if known, for what it will be used.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5ehJp&via=Digg&text=A Breakdown Of The $4.5 Billion Worth Of Crimes BP Committed

div.a: Here's Why Stanford University Changed Its Logo

div.div: Earlier today, we reported that the prestigious Stanford University quietly, but officially, changed its logo. The questing on many an alum's mind: Why?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5h8SM&via=Digg&text=Here's Why Stanford University Changed Its Logo

div.a: The Story Behind The Photo: Journalist’s 11-Month-Old Son Killed In Gaza Strikes

div.div: The front page photo on Thursday’s Washington Post tells, in a single frame, a very personal story from Wednesday’s Israeli airstrikes on the Gaza Strip. Jihad Misharawi, a BBC Arabic journalist who lives in Gaza, carries the body of his 11-month old son, Omar, through al-Shifa hospital in Gaza City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U1G5hR&via=Digg&text=The Story Behind The Photo: Journalist’s 11-Month-Old Son Killed In Gaza Strikes

div.a: The Newest Way To Game Twitter: Declaring War

div.div: Whether this week represents a lasting escalation of tensions in Gaza remains to be seen. But at least one side will leave this week with a much bigger platform.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsyepF&via=Digg&text=The Newest Way To Game Twitter: Declaring War

div.a: The Helicopter That Reads Your Brainwaves

div.div: The Puzzlebox Toy helicopter seems just like any other toy helicopter except for one thing: There is no remote control. It’s in your mind. The aim of the device, being funded on Kickstarter, is more than just fun--it’s to teach kids about neuroscience.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XeEV6i&via=Digg&text=The Helicopter That Reads Your Brainwaves

div.div: Dodd’s mandate is purely economic: figure out how to protect Hollywood’s products from being illegally downloaded on the Internet and, often, sold as bootleg DVDs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TJ4lmH&via=Digg&text=Mr. Dodd Goes To Hollywood

div.a: A Look At The 2012 Italian Truffle Trade

div.div: For Americans, this time of year means turkeys and pumpkin pies. For Italians, and owners of the world's most expensive restaurants, it means white truffles.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UpEY7I&via=Digg&text=A Look At The 2012 Italian Truffle Trade

div.a: Surreal Instagrams From Israel Defense Forces Soldiers

div.div: As drama unfolds between Israel and Hamas both in real life and over their Twitter accounts, young soldiers in the IDF Instagram photos of the downtime before war.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U2fW2f&via=Digg&text=Surreal Instagrams From Israel Defense Forces Soldiers

div.div: TAKING ATTENTION AWAY FROM THE BRIDE

div.a: Entire Wedding Laughs At Photographer Whose Hair Catches On Fire

div.div: The bride, giggling like crazy because everything is going right on her wedding day except this poor photographer’s burning dome, actually makes the international gesture for “TAKE A PHOTO” to someone standing with the flaming victim.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UJlH1q&via=Digg&text=Entire Wedding Laughs At Photographer Whose Hair Catches On Fire

div.a: This Is Your Brain On Freestyle Rap

div.div: Using functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI), a research team scanned the brain of 12 freestyle rap artists as they rapped over an 8-bar musical track created by Rizik-Baer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TONSxl&via=Digg&text=This Is Your Brain On Freestyle Rap

div.a: One Colorado DA Is Dismissing All Pending Small-Scale Marijuana Cases

div.div: District Attorney Stan Garnett will dismiss all pending criminal cases of possession of less than an ounce of marijuana, saying the overwhelming support for Amendment 64 in Boulder County makes it highly unlikely a jury would ever reach a guilty verdict in any of those cases.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W9GNMm&via=Digg&text=One Colorado DA Is Dismissing All Pending Small-Scale Marijuana Cases

div.a: Can You Tell Whether A Robot Or An Artist Painted This Portrait?

div.div: The greatest artist of his generation is named Paul.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PWXg3v&via=Digg&text=Can You Tell Whether A Robot Or An Artist Painted This Portrait?

div.a: Utah Cops May Be Required To Wear Camera Glasses

div.div: When every police-citizen interaction is recorded, maybe we'll be nicer to each other.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZD5Jf3&via=Digg&text=Utah Cops May Be Required To Wear Camera Glasses

div.a: Which Type Of Apple Are You In The Mood For?

div.div: You want a healthy snack for breakfast, you say? Well, does your butler do your shopping? You might enjoy the sweet firmness of a bright red Honeycrisp apple.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S0HGSR&via=Digg&text=Which Type Of Apple Are You In The Mood For?

div.a: Aaron Sorkin's Steve Jobs Movie Is Just 3, 30-Minute Scenes Backstage

div.div: Aaron Sorkin: Each of the 3 :30 min scenes in Steve Jobs movie will take place backstage before a product launch. That's the movie. #hero12

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SPnMZS&via=Digg&text=Aaron Sorkin's Steve Jobs Movie Is Just 3, 30-Minute Scenes Backstage

div.a: Finding The Doctors Your Doctor Trusts

div.div: If everyone gets smarter about health care, and how to navigate the medical industry that can only lead to better outcomes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SYg2VD&via=Digg&text=Finding The Doctors Your Doctor Trusts

div.a: Talking To John Lurie About The Cult Classic 'Fishing With John'

div.div: John Lurie is hard to define. From playing saxophone as the leader of the Lounge Lizards, to hanging out with Jean-Michel Basquiat, to starring in the Jim Jarmusch movies "Down By Law" and "Stranger Than Paradise," Lurie has placed himself all over the cultural map.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QgTiEt&via=Digg&text=Talking To John Lurie About The Cult Classic 'Fishing With John'

div.div: Eric Cesal is the first man on the ground for Architecture for Humanity, which helps rebuild communities devastated by natural disasters like Hurricane Sandy. The globe-trotting volunteer talks about his humanitarian work and encounters with heroes from Haiti to Japan to the Rockaways.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SOrfb4&via=Digg&text=Meet Architecture's First Responder

div.a: Terrorists Can Take Down An Entire City's LTE Network for Just $650

div.div: According to a critical document filed with the National Telecommunications and Information Administration, you can take down any LTE network with a simple $650 piece of gear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNQEDa&via=Digg&text=Terrorists Can Take Down An Entire City's LTE Network for Just $650

div.a: Chilling Photographs Taken Inside Of Berlin's Stasi Prison

div.div: Before the fall of the Eastern Bloch, Berlin’s Stasi Prison was the site of unimaginable horrors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QgwEfh&via=Digg&text=Chilling Photographs Taken Inside Of Berlin's Stasi Prison

div.a: Impressionist Reads 'Fifty Shades Of Grey' In 50 Different Voices

div.div: Christopher Walken reading 'Fifty Shade Of Grey.' That is all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QgxTeq&via=Digg&text=Impressionist Reads 'Fifty Shades Of Grey' In 50 Different Voices

div.div: Former CIA Director Petraeus has been speaking to HLN's Kyra Phillips in the week since the sex scandal broke. So what does he have to say for himself?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QgaV76&via=Digg&text=Petraeus Speaks

div.a: Apple Patenting A Way To Make Your Phone Vibrate Silently

div.div: Apple is investigating ways to make the iPhone's "silent mode" truly silent by monitoring audible sound levels generated by a phone's vibrator and adjusting the mechanism if it becomes too loud.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XI3rM6&via=Digg&text=Apple Patenting A Way To Make Your Phone Vibrate Silently

div.a: Does the Israel-Hamas Internet War Violate Twitter's Terms of Service?

div.div: We're now in day two of Israel's military offensive in Gaza and some are starting to wonder if the war between the IDF and Hamas on Twitter is a violation of the service's terms of service.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UIAwBo&via=Digg&text=Does the Israel-Hamas Internet War Violate Twitter's Terms of Service?

div.div: A look at some of the strangest places that today's biggest video-game companies hailed from.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QIQgss&via=Digg&text=6 Truly Bizarre Video-Game Company Origins

div.a: How Should Airlines Treat Obese Passengers?

div.div: Travelling while obese can be stressful and humiliating. Many American airlines ask overweight passengers to buy extra seats or wait for the next flight if they can't be accommodated. So how should airlines deal with obese passengers?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SPKYr3&via=Digg&text=How Should Airlines Treat Obese Passengers?

div.a: 'Shirtless' FBI Agent Who Hunted Petraeus Also Helped Stop L.A. Bombing

div.div: The FBI agent responsible for the downfall of two of the military’s most respected generals helped stop a terrorist from bombing Los Angeles International Airport and shot a man who attacked him with a knife at the gates of a military base.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TJ2oqv&via=Digg&text='Shirtless' FBI Agent Who Hunted Petraeus Also Helped Stop L.A. Bombing

div.a: Bird Found Wearing Lost Digital Camera Around Its Neck With Photos Intact

div.div: A woman stumbled across a bird with a camera that still had all the photos intact.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SWs4Pf&via=Digg&text=Bird Found Wearing Lost Digital Camera Around Its Neck With Photos Intact
